attributes.action: Save Four Seasons Health Care. Save Garvagh Care Home!
attributes.background: 254 patients to lose their home and 393 staff being made reduntant.All effort should  be made to prevent our patients losing their home, again, and their second family, the staff!

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the UK Government or Parliament could take action on. Responsibility for health and social care in Northern Ireland is a devolved issue.

You could raise this issue with your MLA, who represents you in the Northern Ireland Assembly. You can find your MLA here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/your-mlas/
